forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 50F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area early, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening with clearing overnight. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 51F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low around 40F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 55F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 39F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 56F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 40F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
